meanings.definition: A semiaquatic egg-laying mammal native to Australia, with a duck-like bill and webbed feet.
meanings.sent1: The platypus swims gracefully in the water.
meanings.sent2: I saw a platypus at the zoo last weekend.
meanings.sent3: The platypus wore a tiny top hat to the party.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a platypus among the mundane ideas.
meanings.sent5: The platypus's bill is as unique as a fingerprint.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is unusual or unique in some way.
meanings.sent1: She is a real platypus in our group of friends.
meanings.sent2: The new car design was a platypus in the automotive industry.
meanings.sent3: The platypus of the office always has the quirkiest ideas.
meanings.sent4: His invention was a platypus among the usual gadgets.
meanings.sent5: The platypus of the fashion world always surprises with bold choices.
